name: Salary Man
description:
PLEASE PLAY IN FULLSCREEN

In the year 20XX labor laws prohibit companies from firing their employees...
UNLESS THEY DIE!

Salary Man is a multiplayer game where Player 1 takes on the role of a salary man trying to head home after a long day of work, while Player 2 takes on the role of the evil company trying to lay off their employees via deadly traps.

  • Player 1 can run and jump to reach the doors on each level. Once the player has reached the final door they will have successfully have left the building to start their long commute back home.
  • Player 2 can trigger traps, which are color-coded to match the XBOX controller buttons, by double tapping the buttons. They can also do feint trap triggers by tapping the buttons once.
